item.description:
March 11 - 20, 2013 explore with us the stunning beauty of Thailand and Cambodia on this exciting group adventure!

We will be joining Global Expeditions Club members from all over the US and Canada on an exciting group tour to the exotic and diverse country of Thailand (with an optional 4d/3n trip extension to Angkor Wat in Cambodia)!

Join the club on a group tour March 11 - 20, 2013 to Thailand (with an optional 4d/3n trip extension to Angkor Wat in Cambodia March 20-23)! Explore the vibrant city of Bangkok, the colorful Damnernsaduak Floating Market, the northern cities of Chiang Mai and Chiang Rai, travel through the jungles on an Elephant and a bamboo raft, explore the stunning beautiful beaches in southern Thailand, and why not end this amazing trip with a visit to the ancient city of Angkor Wat in Cambodia.

Want to see what other club members are saying? Then check out the Global Expeditions Club's Testimonial Page.

Price: $1,999 pp, plus airfare

For prices, details or to book your space on this tour, follow this link: www.HeadOutAdventures.com

(NOTE: NOTE: Head Out Adventures is the club's tour supplier for this group trip)

-----------------------------------------------------------------

Included in the awesome adventure:
* Fully guided 10 day tour of Thailand’s best cities, jungles and beaches
* 3 domestic flights: Bangkok-Chiang Mai, Chiang Mai-Phuket, Phuket-Bangkok (mandatory add-on)
* Boat tour of Koh Phi Phi Islands
* Elephant ride into jungle
* Traditional bamboo raft ride down the Mae Taeng River
* Tour of Bangkok, Damnernsaduak Floating Market, Chiang Mai, Chiang Rai and Phuket
* Tours of numerous palaces and temples
* Ox-Cart ride in jungle
* Transportation in private A/C vehicles
* Excellent superior hotels throughout
* English speaking local guide
* English speaking Global Expeditions Club Trip Leader
* Breakfasts, 3 lunches & 1 dinner
* Airport Transportation
* Entrance fees for tours mentioned
* OPTIONAL: 4d/3n trip extension to Angkor Wat in Cambodia

Click here for complete details and to book your space on the trip.

Places Visited: Thailand Group Trip, Koh Phi Phi Island, Phuket, Chiang Mai, Bangkok, Chiang Rai, Damnernsaduak Floating Market, Optional: Cambodia Group Tour, Angkor Wat, Siem Reap

-------------------------------------------------------------------

This group tour is being organized by the Global Expeditions Club: an international adventure travel club with over 16,000+ members.

The tour operator that they are using to coordinate, book and run this trip is: Head Out Adventures.

For more information visit their websites or contact the Global Expeditions Club at:

E-mail: info@GlobalExpeditionsClub.com
Phone: 1.617.645.7689

And, of course, if you have any questions you can always contact me or one of the other organizers through a meetup email!!

Make Friends. Travel the World
item.name: THAILAND: Jungle and Beaches Group Tour (w/ optional Cambodia)-10 Days
